parameters.name: BandwidthPackageId
parameters.description: The ID of the EIP bandwidth plan.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the EIP bandwidth plan. The description must be 2 to 256 characters in length. It must start with a letter but cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the EIP bandwidth plan. The name must be 2 to 128 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, periods (.), underscores (\_), and hyphens (-). It must start with a letter. It cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The ID of the region where the EIP bandwidth plan is created.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
